title: Purex Liquid Laundry Detergent Plus Clorox, Original Fresh, 128 Fl Oz
description: Introducing our best clean available. Purex plus Clorox2 liquid laundry detergent combines the bright clean of Purex detergent with an extra powerful boost of Clorox 2 stain fighters. Purex plus Clorox2 detergent is specially formulated with Clorox2 stain-fighting enzymes to remove the toughest stains. Works with all washing machines, including High-Efficiency (HE). Purex plus Clorox2 works on 100 stains and contains no chlorine bleach, so it’s safe for colors. Use Purex and Clorox together to deliver even better results. Also try Purex plus Clorox2 in Sunny Linen scent. Purex – Bright Clean, Smart Value. This package includes one 128-ounce bottle of Purex plus Clorox2 liquid laundry detergent, enough for 85 loads.
features: Purex plus Clorox 2 detergent is specially formulated with Clorox 2 stain-fighting enzymes to remove the toughest stains Contains a powerful boost of Clorox 2 stain fighters Safe for colors (contains no chlorine bleach) Works with all washing machines, including High-Efficiency (HE) This package includes one 128-ounce bottle of Purex plus Clorox2 liquid laundry detergent, enough for 85 loads

title: Purex 4-in-1 Plus clorox2 laundry detergent pacs, original fresh, 45 Count
description: Say goodbye to mess, spills and heavy bottles! Purex 4-in-1 plus Clorox 2 Pacs are specially formulated with Purex detergent and an extra powerful boost of Clorox 2 stain-fighting enzymes to attack the toughest stains. No more measuring. No more mess. Just toss and go! This package includes one pouch of 45 Purex 4-in-1 plus Clorox 2 laundry detergent pacs, enough for 45 loads. Washing instructions: Use with dry hands only. Pacs dissolve in water. Add detergent pac directly into washer drum, then add clothes. Reseal the bag & store out of reach of children. Wash hands immediately after using. Purex 4-in-1 detergent pacs are compatible with standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines.
features: Powerful combination of detergent and stain fighters Low-sudsing formula rinses clean Dissolves in all water temperatures High-efficiency detergent, optimized for great performance in all machines This package includes one pouch of 45 Purex 4-in-1 plus Clorox 2 laundry detergent pacs, enough for 45 loads.
